title: DR Congo and Rwanda vow to agree peace plan within days
snippets: The two neighbouring nations sign a US-brokered deal aimed at stopping the fighting in eastern DR Congo.
titles: DR Congo and Rwanda vow to agree peace plan within days
constructiveness_reason: This story clearly highlights progress towards peace, offering readers useful insights into a significant development in international relations.
summary: Two neighboring countries have signed a deal facilitated by the United States to cease hostilities in the eastern Democratic Republic of Congo. This agreement aims to bring an end to the conflict in the region.

title: Thirteen killed, dozens under rubble as Israel bombs Gaza amid food crisis

title: UN agency runs out of food aid in Gaza after Israeli blockade
snippets: The UN agency has delivered its last supplies to meals kitchens, which it warns will run out of food in the coming days.
titles: UN agency runs out of food aid in Gaza after Israeli blockade
constructiveness_reason: The story informs readers about a pressing humanitarian issue, but it doesn't provide much insight into potential solutions or improvements.
summary: The UN agency has completed its final delivery of supplies to meal kitchens, with a warning that these facilities will deplete their food resources in the next few days.

title: Wrexham promoted to Championship: Ryan Reynolds club to England's second tier after third straight promotion
snippets: The Welcome to Wrexham team has secured an unprecedented third consecutive promotion to the next higher division and will play only one level below the Premier League
titles: Wrexham promoted to Championship: Ryan Reynolds club to England's second tier after third straight promotion
summary: The Welcome to Wrexham football team achieved a remarkable feat by securing their third consecutive promotion, advancing to just one level below the Premier League. This achievement places them in a higher division, showcasing their significant progress and success in recent seasons.

title: Wrexham AFC promoted to Championship, going up for third-straight season
snippets: The 161-year-old club has made huge waves since being taken over by North American actors Ryan Reynolds and Rob McElhinney in 2020, and have risen from the National League to England's second tier in half a decade.
titles: Wrexham AFC promoted to Championship, going up for third-straight season
summary: In 2020, actors Ryan Reynolds and Rob McElhinney took over a 161-year-old football club, leading to significant progress. Since their acquisition, the club has advanced from the National League to England's second tier within five years, marking a remarkable ascent in the football league system.

title: England survive mighty fright against France to claim Women’s Six Nations grand slam again
snippets: England 43-42 France: The Red Roses just about clung on after a thunderous comeback from the visitors at Allianz Stadium, Twickenham
titles: England survive mighty fright against France to claim Women’s Six Nations grand slam again
summary: England narrowly defeated France with a score of 43-42 in a rugby match at Allianz Stadium, Twickenham. Despite a strong comeback effort from the French team, the Red Roses managed to hold on for the victory.

title: Republicans plan to scrap US audit regulator
snippets: Proposal to fold the Public Company Accounting Oversight Board into the SEC will boost Donald Trump’s deregulatory agenda
titles: Republicans plan to scrap US audit regulator
summary: A proposal has been made to integrate the Public Company Accounting Oversight Board (PCAOB) into the Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC). This move aligns with Donald Trump's broader deregulatory efforts, aiming to streamline oversight and potentially reduce regulatory burdens on public companies.

title: DeepMind UK staff seek to unionise and challenge defence deals and Israel links

titles: DeepMind UK staff seek to unionise and challenge defence deals and Israel links
summary: Employees at Google's AI division have expressed dissatisfaction following the company's decision to abandon a pledge against working on weapons and surveillance projects. This move has led to unrest among the staff, reflecting their concerns over the ethical implications of such technologies.

title: US government defunds research on misinformation
snippets: The US National Science Foundation cancelled funding for research on misinformation, disinformation and AI-generated deepfakes, even as misleading information runs rampant on social media
titles: US government defunds research on misinformation
summary: The US National Science Foundation has halted funding for projects focused on studying misinformation, disinformation, and AI-generated deepfakes. This decision comes at a time when misleading information is widely spread on social media platforms.

title: Are 'zombie' skin cells harmful or helpful? The answer may be in their shapes
snippets: Researchers have identified three subtypes of senescent skin cells with distinct shapes, biomarkers, and functions -- an advance that could equip scientists with the ability to target and kill the harmful types while leaving the helpful ones intact.
titles: Are 'zombie' skin cells harmful or helpful? The answer may be in their shapes
summary: Researchers have discovered three unique subtypes of senescent skin cells, each with different shapes, biomarkers, and roles. This breakthrough allows scientists to potentially target and eliminate the harmful senescent cells without affecting the beneficial ones, enhancing the precision of treatments aimed at aging skin.
